plot: John explains the importance of voting by mail. Also, mass protests against police brutality erupt in Minneapolis, TV hosts inquire about the odd objects behind their stay-at-home guests, and John schools UFC president Dana White.

In the wake of the COVID-19 outbreak everyone is trying to continue their activities in a cautious manner. For the upcoming 2020 US presidential election people are looking for a safe solution. John Oliver discusses that people should not have to choose between living and voting. Voting by mail is a proven solution which is successful for over the years. But to handle the workload and prepare for the election Government needs to work immediately. Unless it will be hard to process the volume and people will be forced to resort to unsafe voting booths to exercise their constitutional right.—Niaz Islam Arif
